Name: Fire Bolt
Description: Deal 2 damage to any creature or player

Name: Summon Abyssal
Description: Summon and abyssal to an adjacent square

Name: Blizzard
Description: Deal 1 damage to all creatures and players

Name: Healing Word
Description: Heal a creature or player for 2 HP

Name: Hungry Ghoul
Description: Summon a Ghoul and take 3 damage
